module.p: dèan do, make is an irregular verb.
Is e gnìomhair neo-riaghailteach a tha ann an dèan.

The principal parts of dèan are –
nì – future independent ie. will do
rinn – past independent ie. did
dèanamh – verbal noun ie. doing
